attributes.title: Bad👎
attributes.review:
I know there’s a lot of bad reviews but to find out it’s really bad.
1. It took a long time to download 
2. It kept saying my phone number was wrong
3. How are you gonna keep America great by an app and it wasn’t even great in the first place 

Trump, I will be speaking to your manager.

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: Downloaded app and now my foot is stuck in a blender. Please remove this from the App Store.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever created I broke my screen and it gives my phone viruses🤬

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is very glitch and made my phone very slow. I do not recommend you downloading this app!!!!! Peppa pig 2020!

attributes.review: This app needs to get off here it’s absolutely horrible it just needs to go in the trash honestly😡👎🤮🤢🤮🤢

attributes.title: This apps stinks😤😤
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and for some reason my dad left me!!😤 Worst app ever! I might sue but I don’t have the brain cells to do that >:((

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app has ruined my life. I will not be voting for the cheeto. Very disappointed. Would rate it 0/5 if possible.
